/ Restricted // 
NO.CAS-8(4)/2009/DIV.I(Vehicle) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated:     26/05/2010 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO. 12 /2010 
 
Subject:-   Facility of Access to  tarmac on his own vehicle by His   
Holiness 
Jagadguru 
Sankaracharya 
Shri 
Swaroopanand  
Saraswati of Dwarka/ Sharda Peeth at airports on Medical 
Grounds.  
 
 
In continuation of this Bureau AVSEC Circular No. 11/2009 dated 
09.07.2009, His Holiness Jagadguru Sankaracharya Shri Swaroopanand 
Saraswati of Dwarka / Sharda Peeth alongwith his ADC or a private security is 
permitted to avail the access of his vehicle up to the tarmac, on medical grounds, 
during his departure / arrival by air at all airports in the country for further period 
of one year beyond 21.06.2010.  
 
 
 
 ( M. Malaviya )  
IPS 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Distribution as per list attached/ overleaf. 
 
Copy to: 
 
1. MCA ( Shri S.Gowri Shankar, Under Secretary),  
       w.r.t MCA letter No.AV.13024/39/2007-SS  dated 12.05.2010 
 
2. Mr. G R Mishra, ADC
